Chance Shaw.style_conflict: Chance focuses on Devon's perceived weakness at lower weights.

Devon Larratt.strength: Chance thinks Devon is significantly weaker at 231 lbs compared to his heavier weight.
Devon Larratt.previous_match_summary: Chance references practice sessions where he pinned Devon multiple times.
